io.github.zachohara.imagecomparator

Class ImageComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.zachohara.imagecomparator.ImageComparator

  • public class ImageComparator
extends java.lang.Object
    The ImageComparator class contains all the core functionality for comparing different images. The images are iterated over in this class, and any matches are then sent to the main window.
    Author:
    Zach Ohara

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static double COMPARISON_THRESHHOLD
      The maximum percent difference between two images before the two images are considered distinct.
      private java.util.List<Image> imageList
      The list of all images that need to be compared.
      private javax.swing.JProgressBar progressBar
      The progress bar that is displayed on the window while images are loading.
      private Window window
      The main Window that matching images are sent to.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageComparator(java.io.File[] fileList, Window win)
      Constructs a new ImageComparator that will compare the given files in the given window.

      Returns the sum of the nth consecutive integers

      Warns the user that a selected file is not a real image file.

      Warns the user that a selected file could not be loaded for an unknown reason.

    • Field Detail

      • window

        private Window window
        The main Window that matching images are sent to.

      • progressBar

        private javax.swing.JProgressBar progressBar
        The progress bar that is displayed on the window while images are loading.

      • imageList

        private java.util.List<Image> imageList
        The list of all images that need to be compared.

      • COMPARISON_THRESHHOLD

        private static final double COMPARISON_THRESHHOLD
        The maximum percent difference between two images before the two images are considered distinct. Raising this number will cause more false positives, and lowering this number will cause more actual matches to be missed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageComparator

        public ImageComparator(java.io.File[] fileList,
                       Window win)
        Constructs a new ImageComparator that will compare the given files in the given window.
        Parameters:
        fileList - the list of files to be checked.
        win - the window to display the images in.

    • Method Detail

      • compareAll

        public void compareAll()
        Iterates through all images and compares them. This method can be thought of as a 'main' method for this class, because it contains all the core functionality.

      • populateImageList

        private void populateImageList(java.io.File[] files)
        Constructs and populates a list of Image objects from an array of File objects.
        Parameters:
        files - the array of Files to use

      • warnInvalidType

        private static void warnInvalidType(java.lang.String filename)
        Warns the user that a selected file is not a real image file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the invalid file.

      • warnLoadError

        private static void warnLoadError(java.lang.String filename)
        Warns the user that a selected file could not be loaded for an unknown reason.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the unloadable file.

      • incrementProgressBar

        private void incrementProgressBar(int n)
        Increments the progress bar by n.
        Parameters:
        n - the increment of the progress bar

        private static int sumOfN(int n)
